document.title: Bootstrapping DevKit to $4.5k MRR
document.summary: In today's show, we're excited to have Mike chats with Indie Dev Benedicte Ruiz about getting into public speaking. Mike was the CEO of Panoramic X, a pioneer web development studio.

body.raw:
In this episode, It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the with the release of letraset sheets containing passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

### Topics

<AudioBookmark time="0:25" text="Jason's first podcast ever" />
<AudioBookmark time="0:53" text="Helen's been on other podcasts: Startups for the Rest of Us, Indie Bites, Indie Worldwide" />
<AudioBookmark time="1:22" text="Should we invest in the 'auto publish to YouTube' feature?" />
<AudioBookmark time="1:41" text="The best features the ones that feel like 'magic' when a customer uses them" />
<AudioBookmark time="2:01" text="The 'wait and see' product development philosophy" />
<AudioBookmark time="2:24" text="A new podcast website builder CMS and website designs" />
<AudioBookmark time="2:45" text="Making a few new podcast website themes" />
<AudioBookmark time="2:57" text="How we run our weekly team meetings" />

### Contributors

<Contributor>
[Jon Buda](#0) lives in London, UK. He's been involved in the podcasting world since 2013, and has been building software since 2002.
</Contributor>
<Contributor>
[Mark Mitchel](#0) lives in London, UK. He's been involved in the podcasting world since 2013, and has been building software since 2002.
</Contributor>
<Contributor>
[Mary James](#0) lives in London, UK. He's been involved in the podcasting world since 2013, and has been building software since 2002.
</Contributor>

document.title: Enterprise Sales as an Indie SaaS featuring Josh Luiz
document.summary: In today's show, we're excited to have Mike chats with Indie Dev Benedicte Ruiz about getting into public speaking. Mike was the CEO of Panoramic X, a pioneer web development studio.

document.title: Focusing on one product in a strong market - For 15 years
document.summary: In today's show, we're excited to have Mike chats with Indie Dev Benedicte Ruiz about getting into public speaking. Mike was the CEO of Panoramic X, a pioneer web development studio.
